raw_body:
TILLEKERATNE – NIHAL C. (Retired Group Human Resource Manager,​ Hayleys Group). Beloved husband of Manel,​ loving father of Eshani & Gayan,​ father-in-law of Dishan & Nadeesha,​ brother of late Professor Lal,​ Kumar,​ Sarath,​ late Vimal,​ late Seelawathi,​ late Nandawathi,​ Geetha and Lakshimi,​ grandfather of Oshila,​ Yunila,​ Chenuli,​ Onara & Oshan passed away. Remains will be at Mahinda Panagoda Funeral Parlour,​ Thalahena,​ Malabe (Tulip VIP Hall) from 8.30 a.m. onwards on Thursday,​ 28th March. Funeral will take place on the same day at 5 p.m. at Thalahena Cemetery,​ Malabe.
021268
